column2: "Hey it's Patty!"
"And Tea."
"Today we have some very vital information that you have to hear!"
"That's information on our enemies, the Darkers!"
"Darkers have been called a lot of things, strong, scary, dangerous. But what exactly about them is all of those things?"
"We have some info that might make you rethink why they're so dangerous!"
"Alright Tea, the rest it up to you!"
"Eh? Why me? So... about Darkers?"
"The scariest thing about Darkers is not their strength, but their ability to infect."
"To put it simply, creatures who get infected by Darker particles, get sick, go crazy and finally..."
"Become Darkers themselves. This is not a joke."
"After being influenced by Darkers, the first sign is unusual violence, especially towards ARKS."
"That and once you get infected, there's no sure way to cure it. And it only spreads further."
"That's why it's important to destroy anything that shows signs of symptoms."
"That's a lot more severe than I imagined."
"But don't worry, since ARKS use photons in our bodies; we have a natural protection from getting infected!"
"As of now there are no reports of that happening! ...probably."
"So fighting with Darkers is like fighting a limitless disease."
"So ARKS is like some kind of long term doctor."
"Uuugh, after listening to what you said Tea, I think I started to feel sick. Maybe I'm infected?"
"I don't think even the Darkers would want someone as stupid as you."
"Ah thanks! That's a relief! Wait! What did you say about me?"
